pr_title: Fixed bug that caused the banner to not work if it's renamed before its first use.

timeline.message: Fixed bug that caused the banner to not work if it's renamed directly after crafting

timeline.author: Minecraftschurli

replies.bodyText:
You are 99% right. The reason why I did it this way is because it's done this way literally in all other items too.
Search in the project for getTag() and look at the Item-Classes. Then look for getOrCreateTag(). See what I mean?
I must assume that the devs have a reason to have it this way. For example, hasTag() takes into consideration isEmpty, while getOrCreateTag() does not. Maybe there has been a bug related to that in the past.
So, when the devs confirm that they simply didn't know about getOrCreateTag(), we should change that everywhere. Otherwise, I prefer streamlined code to individually smart code. You don't want future devs to think "Ah, the banner uses getOrCreate, the others use getTag(), there must be a reason for this."
@Raycoms?
replies.author: JiaYow

replies.bodyText: I believe we've been using hasTag() since forever for all the other items and getOrCreateTag() didn't exist yet.
replies.author: Raycoms
